MYSKILLS.THEORY: Basic theory (What is testing, bug reports, documentation, types, methods, testing directions, etc.)
MYSKILLS.SERVER: What is client-server architecture. Access to remote servers.
MYSKILLS.TERMINAL_LINUX: Linux command line (terminal) (copying, creating, viewing, moving files on servers without a graphical interface)
MYSKILLS.HTTP: HTTP Server request methods,HTTP server response codes,HTTP request and response structures.
MYSKILLS.TRAFFIC: API testing via Postman (JS, API autotests)
MYSKILLS.API: Sniffing http web traffic via Charles and Fiddler
MYSKILLS.TOOLS: Dev Tools of web browsers (Google Chrome, FireFox).
MYSKILLS.VPN: How it works, why it is needed, how to use it, tool options
MYSKILLS.MOBILE_TESTING: Building Android apps on Android Studio, ADB (android Device Management), Configuring proxies and VPNs on iOS and Android
MYSKILLS.SNIFFING: Interception (sniffing) of mobile traffic via Charles and Fiddler on iOS and Android.
MYSKILLS.SQL: Basics of SQL (Create, Delete, Drop, Insert Into, Select, From, Where, Join),Postgres database (installation, configuration and usage).
MYSKILLS.PYTHON: Learning the basics. Creating a client server application
